QueryToExecute:
select
  subnet_id as resource,
  case
    when map_public_ip_on_launch = 'false' then 'ok'
    else 'alarm'
  end as status,
  case
    when map_public_ip_on_launch = 'false' then title || ' auto-assign public IP addresses disabled.'
    else title || ' auto-assign public IP addresses enabled.'
  end as reason
  
  , region, account_id
from
  aws_vpc_subnet;
